P

placeOrder(Order) - Method in class businessLogic.OrderBLL
Places an order by validating the provided order data, checking stock availability, decrementing stock, and generating the associated bill.
presentation - package presentation
 
Product - Class in dataModel
Represents a product with a name, price and available stock.
Product() - Constructor for class dataModel.Product
Default no-argument constructor for creating an empty Product.
Product(int, String, double, int) - Constructor for class dataModel.Product
Constructs a Product with all fields including ID.
Product(String, double, int) - Constructor for class dataModel.Product
Constructs a Product without an ID .
ProductBLL - Class in businessLogic
Business Logic Layer for managing product operations.
ProductBLL(Connection) - Constructor for class businessLogic.ProductBLL

ProductDAO - Class in dataAccess

productName() - Method in record class dataModel.Bill

JavaFX BorderPane for displaying products in a TableView.
